content: for sewing use white yarn to embroider a white spot on the eye at r3 of the eye pic 5 demiwool arms make 2 using green yarn r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 r2 2sc increase x 2 8 r3 3sc increase x 2 10 r4 - 5 2 rounds 10sc 10 r6 3sc decrease x 2 8 do not stuff the arms fold the arm in half crochet 4sc through 2 edges fasten_off cut the yarn and leave a long tail for sewing pic 6 06 demiwool horns make 2 using orange yarn r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 r2 6sc 6 r3 2sc increase x 2 8 r4 8sc 8 do not stuff the horn fasten_off cut the yarn and leave a long tail for sewing pic 7 07 demiwool assembly sew the eye between r7 and r18 of the body sew the arms on both sides of the body between r11 and r12 of the body sew the horns on both sides of the head between r17 and r19 of the body use black yarn or black embroidery thread to embroider the mouth right below the eye optional use pink yarn to embroider the cheeks now you ve finished the green monster demiwool congratulations your green monster is all done demiwool
